name: Tobias Underhill
title: Entertainment Coordinator
description: A friendly halfling with a warm smile and an open mind. He welcomes all performers, believing music brings the community together.

greeting.first_time: Oh hello! I'm Toby! I book the entertainment here at the Grain & Grape. Do you play music? We'd love to have you!
greeting.returning: You're back! Ready to play for us again?
greeting.already_performed: You already played today! Everyone loved it! Come back tomorrow for another performance!

off_duty.text: Just resting my feet! The inn's still open downstairs. Make yourself at home!

ask_about_performing.text: We welcome all musicians hereâ€”doesn't matter what you play! Music brings people together, and that's what village life is all about. We pay once a day, and your charm with the crowd makes a difference in tips!

ask_about_rates.text:
We accept all instruments! Our rates:

Flute: 10 gold
Pan Flute: 10 gold
Lute: 9 gold
Drum: 8 gold
Lyre: 8 gold
Horn: 7 gold
Viol: 7 gold
Bagpipe: 6 gold
Shawm: 6 gold

We can't pay as much as the cities, but everyone's welcome! Plus charisma bonus.

book_performance.text: Wonderful! What instrument will you be playing?
book_performance.failure_no_instrument: You'll need an instrument first, friend!
book_performance.failure_already_performed: You already performed today! Come back tomorrow!

goodbye.text: Take care! Hope to hear you play soon!
